paragraphs.text:
%sql

-- SHOW THE NUMBER OF BENCHMARKS COLLECTED PER JDK

select JDK, count(*) from benchmarks
group by 
  JDK
order by 
  JDK

table.tableOptionSpecHash: [{"name":"useFilter","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable filter for columns"},{"name":"showPagination","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable pagination for better navigation"},{"name":"showAggregationFooter","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable a footer for displaying aggregated values"}]

paragraphs.text:
%sql 

-- SHOW THE BENCHMARK NAMES RUN FOR ANY JDK

select Benchmark, count(*) from benchmarks
where 
  JDK="${JDK=OracleJDK8}"
group by
  Benchmark
order by
  Benchmark

table.tableOptionSpecHash: [{"name":"useFilter","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable filter for columns"},{"name":"showPagination","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable pagination for better navigation"},{"name":"showAggregationFooter","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable a footer for displaying aggregated values"}]

paragraphs.text:
%sql 

-- VERIFY 8 RUNS FOR A GIVEN BENCHMARK TYPE

select Benchmark, count(*) from benchmarks
where 
  Benchmark like "${BenchmarkClass=PersonFilterAndGroup}%"
and 
  Benchmark like "%${BenchmarkType=ECEager_serial}%"
group by
  Benchmark
